name: SoundChat
tagline: Android app to transfer data over sound waves
body:
## Introducing SoundChat
### Trying to do something different.

![screenshot](http://f.cl.ly/items/0f2N0Q0A1Z3M2B3T0b0y/Schermafbeelding%202014-07-30%20om%2022.34.28.png)

* Simple and intuitive interface
* Persistance storage for messages
* Feedback while sending message using progress bar
* Automatic volume control
* and more

### Modulation
* Multiple frequency-shift keying using 16 frequencies

### Demodulation
* Goertzel algorithm

### Still experimental
This app is NOT production ready!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
